title: How to Remove an Item from eBay

steps.title: Go to https://www.ebay.com using a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.ebay.com using a web browser. You can use any web browser. If there is no bids, items can be canceled at any time If an auction has bids and there is fewer than 12 hours remaining in the auction, the auction cannot be canceled. You will need to contact the bidders and ask them to retract their bid. [1] X Research source Fixed-price listings and auctions with no bids can be canceled at any time. eBay strongly discourages users from canceling a listing early. They may place restrictions on your account if you do it too often. When canceling a listing early, you may still be required to pay the final value fee, regardless of whether or not you decide to sell the item to the highest bidder. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Log in to your seller’s eBay account.
steps.content: Log in to your seller’s eBay account. If you are not automatically signed in to your eBay account, use the following steps to sign in to your account. Click Sign In in the upper-right corner. Enter the email or username and password associated with your eBay account. Click the blue button that says Sign In . Check your text messages. Enter the 6-digit number sent to you via text message on the eBay page. Click the blue button that says Continue .

steps.title: Mouse over My eBay.
steps.content: Mouse over My eBay . It's at the top of the page on the right-hand side next to the bell icon. Placing the mouse cursor over this button displays a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Selling.
steps.content: Click Selling . It's in the drop-down menu below "My eBay".

steps.title: Click Active.
steps.content: Click Active . It's in the sidebar menu to the left below "Selling". This displays all your current listings on eBay. If you do not see any options below "Selling" in the sidebar to the left, click the arrow icon 〉 to the right of "Selling" in the sidebar menu to the left. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll down and locate the item or listing you want to remove.
steps.content: Scroll down and locate the item or listing you want to remove. Items are listed vertically in the order they were listed.

steps.title: Click the arrow icon to the right of the listing.
steps.content: Click the arrow icon to the right of the listing. It's to the right of the button that says "Sell Similar" next to each listing. Clicking this arrow icon displays a drop-down menu. If you are viewing the eBay website in classic view, click the drop-down menu that says More actions to the right of the listing. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click End my listing early.
steps.content: Click End my listing early . It's at the bottom of the drop-down menu that appears when you click the arrow icon to the right of a listing.

steps.title: Select a reason for ending the listing.
steps.content: Select a reason for ending the listing. For fixed price sales, you can end the listing at any time. For auctions, you must choose one of the following reasons for canceling early: The item is no longer available for sale. There was an error in the listing. There was an in the starting price, Buy It Now price or reserve price. The Item was lost or broken.

steps.title: Click End my listing.
steps.content: Click End my listing . It's the button below the list of reasons for canceling. This removes the items from eBay. [5] X Research source
